name: IOTConnectSmartHome
0:
”Alexa, turn on the fan”
”Alexa, turn on my bulb”
”Alexa, turn on tube light”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
IOT Connect: Solutions for Home Automation. IOT Connect is a first online portal from where you can control your home devices from anywhere in the world. 

It is based on famous WiFi chip "ESP8266" and firmware is written in Arduino IDE. Codes available on our website.

Hardware developer guys can develop their own prototypes using designs provided on our website. 

https://iot-connect.in

For developers do visit:
https://www.instructables.com/id/IOT-Connect/
